entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:32 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 3:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers beginning this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy later this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
